name: Noise generator
description: Generates various standard colours of noise (Violet, White, Pink, Red, Blended) with configurable amplitude and gain per channel.

parameters.name: Gain
parameters.description: An overall gain to apply, in addition to the per-channel gain.

parameters.name: Output mode
parameters.description: The standard Add/Replace mode selector as described above.

parameters.name: Amplitude
parameters.description: The amplitude of the noise signal (before the gain is applied).

parameters.name: Colour
parameters.description: The noise colour. The options are Blended, Violet, White, Pink, and Red.

parameters.name: Blend
parameters.description: If Blended is selected, sets the blend between noise colours.
